course_description: In the spring semester following completion of ThM501, ThM students sign up for two hours of ThM project with the faculty adviser who will direct the ThM final writing project. The grade for this course and the project seminar (three credits total) are assigned upon completion of the final writing project.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6348, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Wright, Status: Closed
